name: decifra-cidadao
description: O Tradutor de Burocracia - Transformando documentos complexos em linguagem simples e acessível

scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run backend:test && npm run frontend:test
scripts.lint: npm run backend:lint && npm run frontend:lint
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/build frontend/build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Márcio Gil
